titleStmt.title: Peace and not warre: or The moderator. Truly, but yet plainly, stating the case of the Common-VVealth, as to several of the considerable councils & transactions from the year 1636. to 1659. By John Harris, Gent. An affectionate lover of his countryes peace.
titleStmt.author: Harris, John, Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath: Brook, at the Angell in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
